resources.string: You are currently located in the Explicit Activity Layout. The value of the age group has been carried here too.

You are currently located in the Implicit Activity Layout. The value of the age group has been carried here too. The difference between explicit intent and implicit intent is that instead of telling the intent the name of the activity, we tell the intent the action and type of data we are sending.
Go Back To Calculate Age Group ğŸ
The button additionally sends data back to the main Activity.

We are currently in the FirstFragment! But once the button is pressed the code below will be run. It will replace this fragment with the SecondFragment and additionally it will set the Nickname from the EditText field. These 2 fragments communicate through a shared Activity ViewModel.
We are currently in the SecondFragment! This fragment only showcases that we have successfully transferred the data from the EditText field to here!
